ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Name = VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.clcommon__Business_Event__c.Fields.Name , $ObjectType.clcommon__Business_Event__c.Fields.Name , Name ) && Id <> VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.clcommon__Business_Event__c.Fields.Id , $ObjectType.clcommon__Business_Event__c.Fields.Name , Name )
